org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.impl

Class ConnectedSimpleQueryParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.util.QueryBuilder
      • org.apache.lucene.queryparser.simple.SimpleQueryParser
        • org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.impl.ConnectedSimpleQueryParser

  • public class ConnectedSimpleQueryParser
extends SimpleQueryParser
    A FieldsContext aware implementation of the SimpleQueryParser of Lucene.
    Author:
    Guillaume Smet
